name: ebayStore
author: Roya Khosravi

sections.description:
ebay Store Plugin – For ebay store owners. Imports your products from your ebay store and allows you to sell products through your wordpress website/blog.

This Plugin uses some of WP-RSSImport Plugin functions, by Frank Bueltge http://bueltge.de

More About ebayStore Plugin :

http://www.royakhosravi.com/?p=552
sections.installation:
1. Download plugin and unzip.
  2. Upload the plugin file to your WordPress plugins directory inside of wp-content : /wp-content/plugins/
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq: Please visit the ebayStore page for live demo.

short_description: For ebay store owners. Imports your products from your ebay store and allows you to sell products through your wordpress website/blog.
